skill.name: Unarmed Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when not wielding a weapon in the primary hand.

skill.name: 1H Weapon Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when wielding only a single one-handed weapon.

skill.name: 1H Weapon/Shield Attack
skill.description: You auto-attack when wielding a one-handed weapon with a shield.

skill.name: Dual-wield Attack
skill.description: You auto-attack when dual-wielding one-handed weapons.

skill.name: 2H Weapon Attack
skill.description: You auto-attack when wielding a two-handed weapon.

skill.name: Bow Attack
skill.description: You auto-attack when wielding a bow.

skill.name: Crossbow Attack
skill.description: You auto-attack when wielding a crossbow.

skill.name: Flashing Blades
skill.description: After using your Double-edged Strike, you can make a pair of powerful attack against your target.

skill.name: Exposed Throat
skill.description: After using your Double-edged Strike, you make an attack which inflicts high damage, with a chance of creating a 6s opportunity to use Fellowship skills if you are in a Fellowship.

skill.name: Ents go to War
skill.description: The ground shakes as if the Ents themselves were marching to war causing damage and stunning your enemies.

skill.name: Eagle-Friend
skill.description: You are a friend of the Eagles and may now summon one to aid you.

skill.name: Beak Rend
skill.description: This skill deals damage to some of the enemies and returns that as morale to the Eagle.

skill.name: Sacrifice
skill.description: This skill will cause the Eagle to bring his master back from the brink of defeat. This skill only functions if the Eagle is in combat.

skill.name: Fan the Flames
skill.description: This skill takes advantage of an enemy who is under Burning Embers and hurts them grievously by stirring up the flames causing them to run in panic.

skill.name: Bard's Arrow
skill.description: You fire with the skill of Bard himself, driving fear into evil enemies.

skill.name: Press Onward
skill.description: When the need is high, you can move on with little rest, restoring all Power and Morale in only a few seconds.

skill.name: Rain of Thorns
skill.description: You rain thorn arrows down upon your enemies, allowing you to pin multiple targets.

skill.name: Rally!
skill.description: The ways of the elder age are not lost to all races yet, you may bring new inspiration to those whose Morale has been entirely depleted, reviving a defeated target in combat.

skill.name: Song of the Hopeful Heart
skill.description: This song enables you to temporarily reduce the Dread of an area for a short time.

skill.name: Anthem of the Wizards
skill.description: Anthem: Call upon a powerful song to blast your enemies with an area-of-effect of light that will slow the creatures who are hit by it. Requires a recent Tier 3 ballad and resets your ballad counter.

skill.name: Escape from Corruption
skill.description: You are able to revive and protect a fallen companion with three quarters of their Morale and half of their Power.

skill.name: Shield of the Dúnedain
skill.description: You are able to afford protection to one of your companions, but at the cost of half your Power.

skill.name: Oathbreaker's Shame
skill.description: You levy a curse upon your foe which greatly increases the damage your companions can do to it.

skill.name: In Defence of Middle-earth
skill.description: Your very presence inspires those around you to perform better in combat.

skill.name: Ferocious Strikes
skill.description: You make an aggressive triple attack that engenders threat. This attack can only be evaded, it will never miss, and cannot be parried or blocked.

skill.name: Ferocious Strikes
skill.description: You make an aggressive triple attack that engenders threat. This attack can only be evaded, it will never miss, and cannot be parried or blocked.

skill.name: Fight On
skill.description: A cry of defiance that robs the monsters of some of their Power and gives it to you.

skill.name: Raging Blade
skill.description: You make a full area-of-effect attack, inflicting heavy damage, drawing the enemies' attention to yourself. This attack never misses.

skill.name: Raging Blade
skill.description: You make a full area-of-effect attack, inflicting heavy damage, drawing the enemies' attention to yourself. This attack never misses.

skill.name: Controlled Burn
skill.description: Your damage and Power regeneration are increased. This skill can only be executed during combat when you have greater than 20% Morale. It can only be maintained if your Morale does not drop below 20%.

skill.name: To the King
skill.description: You are able to make a powerful attack against an enemy who has suffered from Overwhelm or Thrust, potentially knocking it down.

skill.name: Shield-smash
skill.description: After a successful Bash or Shield-taunt, you may bash him again with your shield for greater damage. This skill draws the enemy's attention to yourself.

skill.name: Guardian's Threat
skill.description: You focus yourself on enraging your enemies.

skill.name: Challenge the Darkness
skill.description: You know how to goad your enemies into attacking you, leaving your allies free to maneuver, as well as raising your Guardian's Ward.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Herald of Victory
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of Victory into battle. This banner increases the maximum Power and in-combat Power regeneration of those around it.

skill.name: Coordinated Attack
skill.description: Your Herald has a chance to stun the target with a melee attack if it is under the affect of one of your Marks. Additionally, your Herald will do 50% more damage if he is behind the target. This skill has a 60 second cooldown. You must first Mark your opponent before this skill can be used.

skill.name: Infuriating Tactics
skill.description: Your Herald will taunt the target with a melee attack if it is under the affect of one of your Marks. This skill has a 15 second cooldown. You must first Mark your opponent before this skill can be used.

skill.name: Lend Will
skill.description: Your Herald encourages you in times of battle, raising your morale at the cost of his own. This skill has a 90 second cooldown.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Herald of Victory
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of Victory into battle. This banner increases the maximum Power and in-combat Power regeneration of those around it.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Herald of Victory
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of Victory into battle. This banner increases the maximum Power and in-combat Power regeneration of those around it.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Herald of Victory
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of Victory into battle. This banner increases the maximum Power and in-combat Power regeneration of those around it.

skill.name: Escape from Darkness
skill.description: You are able to revive a fallen companion with half of their Morale and a quarter of their Power.

skill.name: Rallying Cry
skill.description: When an enemy is defeated, your Cry rallies the Morale of your nearby fellows.

skill.name: War-cry
skill.description: When an enemy is defeated, you let out a Cry which rallies your nearby fellows to attack with greater speed and determination.

skill.name: Routing Cry
skill.description: When an enemy is defeated, you let out a fearsome Cry which slightly demoralizes all other foes nearby.

skill.name: Battle-shout
skill.description: Your fearsome Shout strikes terror into the hearts of your enemies and puts you into a Battle-readied State.

skill.name: Enraged Shout
skill.description: Your fearsome Shout strikes terror into the hearts of your enemies and puts you into a Battle-readied State.

skill.name: Defensive Strike
skill.description: You attack defensively. On a successful strike you cause light damage, but recover quickly to protect yourself from returned attacks.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Herald of War
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of War into battle. This banner increases the Might and Agility of those around it.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Herald of War
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of War into battle. This banner increases the might and agility of those around it.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Herald of War
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of War into battle. This banner increases the might and agility of those around it.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Herald of War
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of War into battle. This banner increases the might and agility of those around it.

skill.name: Muster Courage
skill.description: You are able to renew the courage of your nearby companions, removing all existing fear effects from them.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Herald of Hope
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of Hope into battle. This banner increases the maximum Morale and in-combat Morale regeneration of those around it.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Herald of Hope
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of Hope into battle. This banner increases the maximum Morale and in-combat Morale regeneration of those around it.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Herald of Hope
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of Hope into battle. This banner increases the maximum Morale and in-combat Morale regeneration of those around it.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Herald of Hope
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of Hope into battle. This banner increases the maximum Morale and in-combat Morale regeneration of those around it.

skill.name: Devastating Blow
skill.description: If you land a Critical Hit, this attack will deal devastating bonus damage and allow the usage of enemy defeat skills, as well as allowing you to enter into the Battle-hardened state. You must be in a Battle-readied State to use this skill.

skill.name: Threatening Shout
skill.description: Your Shout threatens your enemy, increasing the chance that it will attack you.

skill.name: Intimidating Shout
skill.description: Your Shout threatens your enemy, increasing the chance that it will attack you.

skill.name: Swift Strike
skill.description: You make a swift melee attack.

skill.name: Battle-frenzy
skill.description: Your Fervour is instantly increased.

skill.name: Dire Need
skill.description: Half of your Power is transferred to Morale.

skill.name: Sting
skill.description: A quick attack that will lightly wound your opponent.

skill.name: Shield-swipe
skill.description: After successfully blocking an enemy's blow, you may attack with both your weapon and shield. This skill draws the enemy's attention to yourself.

skill.name: Guardian's Ward
skill.description: Your great skill enables you to strengthen your defences for a short time.

skill.name: Shield-blow
skill.description: You strike your opponent with your shield. This skill generates additional threat.

skill.name: Catch a Breath
skill.description: You catch your breath after blocking an enemy's attack, restoring Morale

skill.name: Vexing Blow
skill.description: You are capable of drawing an enemy's attention to yourself with this attack.

skill.name: Vexing Blow
skill.description: You are capable of drawing an enemy's attention to yourself with this attack.

skill.name: Challenge
skill.description: You know how to goad your enemies into attacking you, leaving your allies free to maneuver.

skill.name: Protection
skill.description: When wielding a shield, you may protect one of your allies, improving his defence and allowing you to react to attacks made against him.

skill.name: Protection
skill.description: When wielding a shield, you may protect one of your allies, improving his defence and allowing you to react to attacks made against him.

skill.name: Guardian's Pledge
skill.description: Your great skill enables you to strengthen your defences for a short time.

skill.name: Deep Breath
skill.description: You gather your wits and instantly recover some of your skills.

skill.name: Warrior's Heart
skill.description: You have the ability to improve your Morale for a time, even above its normal maximum.

skill.name: Thrill of Danger
skill.description: The thrill of danger allows you to regain Power, increasing with every enemy near you. This skill works in combat only.

skill.name: Improved Thrill of Danger
skill.description: The thrill of danger allows you to regain Power, increasing with every enemy near you. This skill opens up other skills for use. This skill works in combat only.

skill.name: Set Trap
skill.description: Your survival skills enable you to lay traps for enemies which can hold them in place. The trap remains for 60 seconds after being placed. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Intent Concentration
skill.description: In a desperate time, you can instantly reach full Focus.

skill.name: Beneath Notice
skill.description: Your survival-skills allow you to make yourself appear less threatening to enemies for a short time.

skill.name: Needful Haste
skill.description: You can sacrifice some of your Focus to make ranged attacks at a faster rate.

skill.name: Staff-strike
skill.description: With a mighty blow, you raise your weapon to fell your enemy.

skill.name: Improved Staff-strike
skill.description: With a mighty blow, you raise your weapon to fell your enemy with a chance of stunning. When used on a flanked enemy, this ability does even greater damage.

skill.name: Power of Knowledge
skill.description: You steal the Power of your enemy, slowly increasing your own.

skill.name: Power of Knowledge
skill.description: You steal the Power of your enemy, slowly increasing your own.

skill.name: Beacon of Hope
skill.description: Transfers Morale to an ally or companion.

skill.name: Sign of the Wild: Protection
skill.description: This sign wards your animal friend so that it may parry enemy attacks more frequently and resists damage more effectively. You cannot have more than one sign active on your companion at a time.

skill.name: Leechcraft
skill.description: You are able to remove wounds suffered by an ally.

skill.name: Leechcraft
skill.description: You are able to remove wounds in an area-of-effect. This can be used in combat.

skill.name: Sign of the Wild: Rage
skill.description: This sign asks your animal friend to go into a rage, attacking faster and making itself look as threatening as possible. You cannot have more than one sign active on your companion at a time.

skill.name: Cracked Earth
skill.description: The ground cracks beneath the enemy's feet, inflicting damage and after ten seconds the great upheavels in Arda, roots the target.

skill.name: Wisdom of the Council
skill.description: Your knowledge of the White Council gives your Morale a boost in times of need. For a short time, it will also protect you and damage enemies who strike you.

skill.name: Blinding Flash
skill.description: A blinding flash accompanied by a loud crack and the smell of blasting powder causes the foe to stop all action. Any damage inflicted on the target will break its stupour.

skill.name: Tend the Sick
skill.description: You are able to cure disease.

skill.name: Tend the Sick
skill.description: You are able to cure disease in an area-of-effect.

skill.name: Ancient Wisdom
skill.description: Your research into lost knowledge increases your Will.

skill.name: Ancient Wisdom
skill.description: Your research into lost knowledge greatly increases your Will.

skill.name: Share the Power
skill.description: You can transfer a portion of your Power to an ally or companion.

skill.name: Ballad of War
skill.description: Tier 3 Ballad: A quick ballad that gives your fellowship a bonus to their melee damage. Requires a recent Tier 2 ballad.

skill.name: Anthem of the Valar
skill.description: Anthem: Call upon a song to blast your enemies with an area-of-effect of light. Requires a recent Tier 3 ballad and resets your ballad counter.

skill.name: Anthem of the Valar
skill.description: Anthem: Call upon a song to blast your enemies with an area-of-effect of light. Requires a recent Tier 3 ballad and resets your ballad counter.

skill.name: Song of Aid
skill.description: The minstrel inspires his fellows to heroic feats, opening up gated skills to most classes, and enables Lore-masters to use Beacon of Hope more frequently at a lower Morale cost.

skill.name: Song of Aid
skill.description: The minstrel inspires his fellows to heroic feats, opening up gated skills to most classes, and enables Lore-masters to use Beacon of Hope more frequently at a lower Morale cost. This improved version has a longer duration and shorter recovery time.

skill.name: Ballad of Resonance
skill.description: Tier 1 Ballad: A quick ballad that gives you a bonus to Tactical attacks and harms your foe.

skill.name: Enlivening Grace
skill.description: Brings hope to those whose Morale has been entirely depleted, reviving a defeated ally.

skill.name: Cry of the Chorus
skill.description: This skill enables you to access every Ballad Tier and Anthem at once. It also breaks any silence effects on you.

skill.name: Song of Soothing
skill.description: This skill soothes targets in an area who already have hate for you. This increases the likelyhood of the enemy choosing another target.

skill.name: Subtle Stab
skill.description: You may make a quick, sharp attack against your foe.

skill.name: Riddle
skill.description: You are capable of posing riddles to your enemies, which may momentarily distract them, dazing them for a short time or until damaged. This will not work on Beasts, Insects, or Creatures of Nature.

skill.name: Aim
skill.description: Your careful aim ensures the next damage-dealing attack skill will result in a Critical Hit and has much lower chance of missing. Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: Trick: Dust in the Eyes
skill.description: You throw dust in your enemy's eyes, making it more difficult for your enemy to hit. You can only have one Trick on a target at once.

skill.name: Trick: Dust in the Eyes
skill.description: You throw dust in your enemy's eyes, making it more difficult for your enemy to hit. You can only have one Trick on a target at once.

skill.name: Diversion
skill.description: When in Stealth, you can divert an enemy's attention away from yourself for a short time. Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: Trick: Disable
skill.description: You can strike a foe to slow their attacks for a short while. You can only have one Trick on a target at once.

skill.name: Trick: Counter Defence
skill.description: You execute an attack that will lower your enemy's defences for a short time. You can only have one Trick on a target at once.

skill.name: Hide in Plain Sight
skill.description: You can disappear from before your enemy's eyes. For a little while, your Stealth is improved, and even taking damage will not break your cover. Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: Sneak
skill.description: You have the ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you, especially when moving in front of them.

skill.name: Stalk
skill.description: You have the ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you.

skill.name: Trick: Enrage
skill.description: You enrage your foe, causing him to flail around at any target he considers a threat. You can only have one Trick on a target at once.

skill.name: Track Mines
skill.description: When active, nearby ore deposits are displayed on the radar.

skill.name: Track Wood
skill.description: When active, nearby tree branches are displayed on the radar.

skill.name: Track Crops
skill.description: When active, nearby crops are displayed on the radar.

skill.name: Wild Attack
skill.description: A single powerful melee attack.

skill.name: Blade-wall
skill.description: You make a frontal area-of-effect attack.

skill.name: Savage Strikes
skill.description: You make a savage double attack.

skill.name: Fervour
skill.description: Your damage and Power regeneration are increased at the expense of avoidance.

skill.name: Flurry
skill.description: Your attack speed is increased.

skill.name: Brutal Strikes
skill.description: You make three deadly attacks.

skill.name: Exchange of Blows
skill.description: You respond to some of your opponents attacks with swift counter-attacks.

skill.name: Blade-storm
skill.description: You make a full area-of-effect attack.

skill.name: Bracing Attack
skill.description: You make an attack which allows you to brace yourself against counterattack, increasing your Morale by a small amount.

skill.name: Cleave
skill.description: You make a full area-of-effect attack, which can cause light damage over time.

skill.name: Sudden Defence
skill.description: You lose all Fervour and enter a defensive stance, which increases your parry and evade rates, but also removes fervour.

skill.name: Relentless Strike
skill.description: You use all of your Fervour to deal a devastating attack. This attack can only be evaded, it will never miss against on level targets, and cannot be parried or blocked.

skill.name: Champion's Challenge
skill.description: Your taunting cry forces your target to face and attack you for a few seconds.

skill.name: Merciful Strike
skill.description: You make a powerful attack that can only be used on opponents under 20% health.

skill.name: Fighting Dirty
skill.description: You make a cunning attack that catches your opponents off-guard. Your next area-of-effect attack will cause more damage. It can only be used on opponents below 25% health.

skill.name: Sprint
skill.description: Your run speed is increased.

skill.name: Clobber
skill.description: You make a swift melee attack, which interrupts any time-delayed actions your opponent is attempting.

skill.name: Sound the Attack
skill.description: You make a full area-of-effect attack, which stuns your opponents.

skill.name: Hamstring
skill.description: You make an attack which snares your opponent.

skill.name: Hedge
skill.description: You make a melee attack that dissuades your target from continuing to attack you. The target will only stop attacking you if there is another more threatening target nearby.

skill.name: Stallion's Spirit
skill.description: This fellowship skill replenishes your power and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Ent's Strength (Melee)
skill.description: This fellowship skill does direct melee damage to your target and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Eagle's Cry
skill.description: This fellowship skill replenishes your morale and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Spider's Guile (Melee)
skill.description: This fellowship skill does minor direct melee damage to your target, then more damage over time and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Shoot
skill.description: You attack with your ranged weapon.

skill.name: Boast
skill.description: Tales of your heroic acts draw cheers from the crowd.

skill.name: Cutting Attack
skill.description: A light, bleeding attack, which causes your foe damage over time.

skill.name: Telling Mark
skill.description: You leave a Mark on your enemy that increases the amount of damage that you and your companions will deal to it. You may only mark one target at a time.

skill.name: Make Haste
skill.description: You command your Fellowship to make better speed, both in and out of battle.

skill.name: Noble Mark
skill.description: You leave a Mark on your enemy, damaging your foe over time. You may only mark one target at a time.

skill.name: Pressing Attack
skill.description: You swing twice at your enemy, inflicting medium damage. If you land a Critical Hit on the second attack, you will be able to use your enemy defeat skills, as well as allowing you to enter into the Battle-hardened state. You must be in a Battle-readied State to use this skill.

skill.name: Words of Courage
skill.description: You are able to renew one of your companions' Morale over time.

skill.name: Motivating Speech
skill.description: You are able to raise the Morale of your nearby companions with a motivating speech.

skill.name: Tactic: On Guard
skill.description: Your tactic is to be on guard, increasing chances of parrying attacks. No one can have more then one Tactic on at a time.

skill.name: Last Stand
skill.description: You are able to resist succumbing to defeat for a short time.

skill.name: Tactic: Relentless Attack
skill.description: Your tactic is to attack relentlessly, increasing Critical Hit chance. No one can have more then one Tactic on at a time.

skill.name: Revealing Mark
skill.description: You leave a Mark on your enemy that will renew the Morale of your companions when they wound the target. You may only mark one target at a time.

skill.name: Cry of Vengeance
skill.description: When one of your companions falls, your Cry will return a nearby fellow back to battle and inspire those around you to greater feats of skill.

skill.name: In Harm's Way
skill.description: You put yourself in harm's way to defend your nearby companions, taking all damage dealt to them upon yourself.

skill.name: Tactic: Focus
skill.description: Your tactic is to focus, increasing power regeneration while in combat. No one can have more then one Tactic on at a time.

skill.name: Command Respect
skill.description: Your presence commands respect from those around you.

skill.name: Herald's Strike
skill.description: This melee attack increases the effects of healing on yourself for a short time.

skill.name: Raise the Spirit
skill.description: Words of encouragement that renew the Morale of a companion or yourself.

skill.name: Ballad of Vigour
skill.description: Tier 1 Ballad: A quick ballad that gives you Vitality and harms your foe.

skill.name: Piercing Cry
skill.description: Your shout does light damage to your enemies.

skill.name: Ballad of Steel
skill.description: Tier 1 Ballad: A quick ballad that gives you an armour bonus and harms your foe.

skill.name: Ballad of Swiftness
skill.description: Tier 2 Ballad: A quick ballad that gives you a bonus to your attack speed and harms your foe. Requires a recent Tier 1 ballad.

skill.name: Ballad of Unshakeable Will
skill.description: Tier 3 Ballad: A quick ballad that gives your fellowship a bonus to their resistance to fear. Requires a recent Tier 2 ballad.

skill.name: Inspire Fellows
skill.description: Words of encouragement renew the Morale of your fellowship and increase its vigour.

skill.name: Cry of the Valar
skill.description: Calling upon the Valar can send certain evil foes fleeing in terror for a short time.

skill.name: Ballad of Balance
skill.description: Tier 2 Ballad: A quick ballad that gives you a bonus to your Evade and harms your foe. Requires a recent Tier 1 ballad.

skill.name: Noble Cause
skill.description: The next three Herald's Strikes you execute do extra damage and return part of that as Morale to your group. When you invoke this skill your reset timer of Herald's Strike is reset.

skill.name: Bolster Courage
skill.description: Words of encouragement renew the Morale of a companion or yourself. This maneuver is larger but slower than Raise the Spirit.

skill.name: Song of Restoration
skill.description: A song that makes an allies' hearts glad again, removing some of the oppression of defeat.

skill.name: Song of the Dead
skill.description: This song causes undead to freeze in fear.

skill.name: Anthem of the Free Peoples
skill.description: Anthem: Increases Morale regeneration in combat for you and your Fellowship and generates less threat then direct healing. Requires a recent Tier 3 ballad and resets your ballad counter.

skill.name: Tale of Heroism
skill.description: This aura increases the Will and Fate of your Fellowship.

skill.name: Anthem of Compassion
skill.description: Anthem: Decreases the amount of threat you generate from healing. Requires a recent Tier 3 ballad and resets your ballad counter.

skill.name: Cure Fear
skill.description: Your inspirational spirit can dispel fear afflicting yourself or others.

skill.name: Triumphant Spirit
skill.description: A desperate cry instantly renews the Morale of your fellowship, but draws a large amount of attention to yourself.

skill.name: Ballad of Flame
skill.description: Tier 3 Ballad: A quick ballad that gives your fellowship a bonus to their resistance to fire. Requires a recent Tier 2 ballad.

skill.name: Song of Distraction
skill.description: A song that can make your enemy become drowsy and not detect players until they are much closer than normal. This does not work against monsters already engaged in combat.

skill.name: Ballad of the Stout
skill.description: Tier 2 Ballad: A quick ballad that gives you a bonus to all your resistances and harms your foe. Requires a recent Tier 1 ballad.

skill.name: Still As Death
skill.description: You are talented at feigning death, causing enemies to ignore you completely.

skill.name: Lay of the Hammerhand
skill.description: This lay enables you to take damage from your Power instead of Morale when toggled. The name comes from the adage that those who know this lay were said to have been able to take a blow from Helm Hammerhand himself. Stuns and Knockdowns will interupt the lay.

skill.name: Burning Embers
skill.description: Red-hot embers swirl around the target, causing damage over time and slowing movement.

skill.name: Raven-lore
skill.description: Your understanding of the speech of ravens allows you to call one to assist in your adventures.

skill.name: Inner Flame
skill.description: You can transfer some of your Power to Morale for both yourself and your companion. This skill only works if you have a companion summoned.

skill.name: Gust of Wind
skill.description: Air swirls around the target kicking up debris and other objects that causes damage and distracts nearby enemies.

skill.name: Friend of Bears
skill.description: Your understanding of the speech of bears allows you to call one to assist in your adventures.

skill.name: Test of Will
skill.description: You test the will of your enemy. When successful, it will damage and stun the target. This skill has a large bonus to it's critical chance and magnitude.

skill.name: Sign of Power: Wizardry
skill.description: When your companion has flanked your enemy, the sign of Wizardry shall provide you with Morale and deals damage to your enemy. Used normally, it deals light-based damage over time.

skill.name: Sign of Power: Command
skill.description: This sign causes your enemy to pause so it attacks slower and parries less often.

skill.name: Sign of Power: Righteousness
skill.description: This sign will cure silence, knockdown, and knock-out effects, and then will provide temporary immunity to knockdown and knock-out effects. Used preventively, it will make you immune to these effects for a period of time.

skill.name: Sign of Power: Vigilance
skill.description: This sign provides you with a heightened vigilance against those who would hide from your gaze.

skill.name: Fire-lore
skill.description: Your knowledge of things natural gives you influence over the very environment itself. You are able to subtly raise the temperature, making it difficult for most creatures to deal damage to you.

skill.name: Wind-lore
skill.description: Your knowledge of things natural gives you influence over the air itself, allowing you to slow many of your enemies at once.

skill.name: Herb-lore
skill.description: Your knowledge of things natural gives you influence over the ground and plants, allowing you to root a group of enemies in place.

skill.name: Call to the Valar
skill.description: You call upon the wisdom of the Valar, recovering some of your skills.

skill.name: Light of the Rising Dawn
skill.description: Your wisdom can light even the darkest of places, harming and stunning those that are in opposition to your purpose.

skill.name: Sweeping Cut
skill.description: Large sweeping strokes cut into all of your foes standing before you.

skill.name: Guardian's Defence
skill.description: You focus your defences on blocking attacks.

skill.name: Retaliation
skill.description: You are skilled at swiftly retaliating after parrying an enemy's attack.

skill.name: Bash
skill.description: After a successful Shield-swipe, you may bash him again with your shield, stunning him briefly. This skill draws the enemy's attention to yourself.

skill.name: Overwhelm
skill.description: You are able to make a powerful attack against an enemy who has suffered your Retaliation. This attack will stun the target on a critical hit.

skill.name: Guardian's Parry
skill.description: You focus your defences on parrying attacks.

skill.name: Whirling Retaliation
skill.description: After successfully retaliating, you may make a whirling attack against all enemies in a circle around you.

skill.name: Thrust
skill.description: Follow-up your Retaliation with a thrusting blow, which will open a bleeding wound.

skill.name: Shield-taunt
skill.description: Laugh at your enemies after bashing them with your Shield-swipe, taunting them. This skill draws the enemy's attention to yourself.

skill.name: Stamp
skill.description: Your attack enables you to break your enemy's concentration, interrupting his actions.

skill.name: Turn the Tables
skill.description: When dazed, stunned, knocked down, or knocked out you may turn the tables on your enemy, recovering from the effects and instilling them in your enemy.

skill.name: Guardian's Promise
skill.description: You can create a whistle out of an acorn that will allow your fellows to call you to them when they are in need.

skill.name: Trip
skill.description: You can knock an enemy down, opening up an opportunity to use Fellowship skills if you are in a Fellowship. Only useable while in Stealth.

skill.name: Surprise Strike
skill.description: You are skilled at surprising your enemy in battle, inflicting more damage when attacking from behind or while in Stealth. Critical hits with Surprise Strike are more damaging than most skills.

skill.name: Cunning Attack
skill.description: Your formidable cunning allows a darting attack which continues to deal damage after you strike, dealing even more damage if the attack is made while in Stealth.

skill.name: Provoke
skill.description: You can cause your enemy to focus his aggression on his current opponent, whether that is yourself or an ally.

skill.name: Burglar's Advantage
skill.description: You are able to make another attack after a Critical Hit, inflicting more damage when attacking from behind.

skill.name: Double-edged Strike
skill.description: After using your Burglar's Advantage, you can make two attacks against your target.

skill.name: Exploit Opening
skill.description: You are able to stun your target, creating an opportunity to use Fellowship skills if you are in a Fellowship.

skill.name: Addle
skill.description: You confuse your enemy so thoroughly that he fails any skill attempts in process, and any subsequent skill attempts for a short time take much longer to execute.

skill.name: Startling Twist
skill.description: You startle an enemy with an active Trick on them, stunning them for 8s and removing the Trick.

skill.name: Mischievous Glee
skill.description: You can surprise a foe with an active Trick on them, removing the Trick and restoring some of your Morale. This will never miss against on level targets, nor can it be parried, blocked, or evaded.

skill.name: Reveal Weakness
skill.description: While you maintain this ability, you are able to point out weaknesses in your enemy's defences, increasing the damage taken from attacks. Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: Ready and Able
skill.description: You are ready for action again, resetting the recovery timers on many of your skills. Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: Touch and Go
skill.description: You can improve your ability to evade your enemy's attacks for a short time. Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: Find Footing
skill.description: When dazed, stunned, knocked down, or knocked out you may quickly recover, gaining Morale and a temporary improvement to your evasion. Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: Track Treasure
skill.description: Turns on tracking for treasure chests and other value-laden containers.

skill.name: Burgle
skill.description: While sneaking about, you can attempt to lighten the pockets of unsuspecting targets.

skill.name: Cure Poison
skill.description: Your resourcefulness allows you to purge poisons ailing an ally.

skill.name: Quick Shot
skill.description: You can nock and loose an arrow quickly.

skill.name: Barbed Arrow
skill.description: Your arrow can cause a wound that bleeds and slightly slows movement speed.

skill.name: Swift Bow
skill.description: You are able to loose two missiles in rapid succession.

skill.name: Penetrating Shot
skill.description: An extremely damaging shot that pierces the armour of your enemy, ignoring 10% mitigation.

skill.name: Rain of Arrows
skill.description: You rain arrows down upon your enemies, allowing you to hit multiple targets.

skill.name: Merciful Shot
skill.description: When your enemy falls below 25% of its health, you may make a shot which inflicts massive damage. If you land a Critical Hit, this attack will deal exceptional bonus damage.

skill.name: Swift Stroke
skill.description: A fast, damaging melee attack.

skill.name: Low Cut
skill.description: You can make a low cut in front of you which can temporarily slow the movement speed of up to 2 of your enemies.

skill.name: Scourging Blow
skill.description: This attack wounds your foe, dealing additional damage if the enemy is suffering from your Barbed Arrow. However, using this skill will stop the bleeding.

skill.name: Blindside
skill.description: You are able to divert your enemy's attention with a single melee strike and follow it with a single bow-attack at close range.

skill.name: Agile Rejoinder
skill.description: When you parry an enemy's attack, you can respond with a highly damaging melee attack.

skill.name: Find the Path
skill.description: Your skill as a tracker allows you to increase the speed with which your Fellowship can move across terrain. Entering combat disables this ability.

skill.name: Purge Poison
skill.description: Your survival-lore allows you to use naturally-occurring medicines to purge poisons from an ally.

skill.name: Bright Campfire
skill.description: Your survival-skills enable you to make your Fellowship comfortable in the wild, increasing their recovery and enabling some crafting skills. The campfire lasts for 3 minutes.

skill.name: Desperate Flight
skill.description: Your knowledge of the land and of its many secret ways allows you to escape from danger and travel to a nearby rally point. Requires rations which may be acquired from Provisioners.

skill.name: Guide to Thorin's Hall
skill.description: Your skill as a tracker allows you to find a path for you and your Fellowship to Thorin's Halls. This skill is easily interrupted. Requires rations which may be acquired from Provisioners.

skill.name: Guide to Bree
skill.description: Your skill as a tracker allows you to find a path for you and your Fellowship to Bree. This skill is easily interrupted. Requires rations which may be acquired from Provisioners.

skill.name: Guide to Esteldín
skill.description: Your skill as a tracker allows you to find a path for you and your Fellowship to Esteldin. This skill is easily interrupted. Requires rations which may be acquired from Provisioners.

skill.name: Guide to Rivendell
skill.description: Your skill as a tracker allows you to find a path for you and your Fellowship to Rivendell. This skill is easily interrupted. Requires rations which may be acquired from Provisioners.

skill.name: Passage of Nature
skill.description: Your skill as a tracker allows you to detect the presence of nearby beasts and other natural creatures.

skill.name: Passage of Foes
skill.description: Your skill as a tracker allows you to detect the presence of nearby orcs, trolls, giants, and evil men or dwarves.

skill.name: Passage of Shadow
skill.description: Your skill as a tracker allows you to detect the presence of the dead, the unseen, and ancient evil.

skill.name: Camouflage
skill.description: You have the ability to blend into your surroundings, making it difficult for your foes to detect you so long as you remain still.

skill.name: Cry of the Predator
skill.description: You mimic the cry of a predatory animal, causing an enemy beast to run in fear.

skill.name: Ent's Strength (Ranged)
skill.description: This fellowship skill does direct ranged damage to your target and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Spider's Guile (Ranged)
skill.description: This fellowship skill does minor direct ranged damage to your target, then more damage over time and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Focus
skill.description: Before combat, you may rapidly increase your Focus. Focus is required to use some bow skills and is lost if you move.

skill.name: Stance: Precision
skill.description: You take a stance which decreases the possibility that your enemies will avoid your shots. While in Precision Stance, your Quick Shot has an increased chance to score Critical Hits.

skill.name: Stance: Strength
skill.description: You take a stance which increases the damage of your shots, while increasing the Power cost and draws the enemy's attention to yourself. While in Strength Stance, your Quick Shot will slow your enemy's movement.

skill.name: Stance: Endurance
skill.description: You take a stance which decreases the Power cost and reduces the chance that your enemy's attention will turn to you. While in Endurance Stance, your Quick Shot does not draw as much attention as it normally does.

skill.description: Guile Melee Pair

skill.name: Guile Ranged Pair
skill.description: Guile Ranged Pair

skill.description: Guile Contribution

skill.description: Guile Melee Triplet

skill.description: Strength Quintuplet

skill.name: Guile Melee Quintuplet
skill.description: Guile Melee Quintuplet

skill.name: Guile Ranged Quintuplet
skill.description: Guile Ranged Quintuplet

skill.name: Tactics Quituplet
skill.description: Tactics Quituplet

skill.name: Strength Sextuplet
skill.description: Strength Sextuplet

skill.name: Strength Sextuplet

skill.name: Guile Melee Sextuplet
skill.description: Guile Melee Sextuplet

skill.name: Guile Ranged Sextuplet
skill.description: Guile Ranged Sextuplet

skill.name: Tactics Sextuplet
skill.description: Tactics Sextuplet

skill.name: Conviction Sextuplet
skill.description: Conviction Sextuplet

skill.name: Resilience
skill.description: You are hardier than most and can recover from being knocked down and stunned.

skill.name: Disarm
skill.description: With a flash of steel you render your target unable to use their weapons for a short while. This skill can only be used against players.

skill.name: Hamstring
skill.description: You cut the legs of your foe, slowing their movement.

skill.name: Clinging Webs
skill.description: You spray your target with clinging, sticky webs, reducing their chance to Parry or Evade.

skill.name: Lie In Wait
skill.description: When not in combat, you can hide beneath the ground, unseen by foes, until you burst from the ground.

skill.name: Set Trap
skill.description: You carefully place a snare on the ground to trap your foes.

skill.name: Death Blossom
skill.description: You release several arrows in quick succession hitting multiple foes around your target.

skill.name: Flaming Arrow
skill.description: A fire tipped arrow which will continue to burn the target after landing.

skill.name: Snap Out of It!
skill.description: You can shout at an ally who is stunned or knocked down and they will begin to recover.

skill.name: Mobilize
skill.description: While not in combat, you and your nearby allies can run faster.

skill.name: Quit Whining and Fight!
skill.description: You exhort and deride your allies, restoring some of their health.

skill.name: Rallying Howl
skill.description: When you defeat an enemy, you can howl to heal yourself and your fellows over time.

skill.name: Disappear
skill.description: From beneath the very nose of your foe, you can disappear and prowl unseen once more. For a shortwhile your stealth is extremely effective.

skill.name: Stealth
skill.description: You can prowl beneath the notice of all but the keenest eyes, waiting to strike.

skill.name: Wild Attack
skill.description: You make a powerful melee attack, followed by a quick off-hand swipe.

skill.name: Blade-wall
skill.description: You make a frontal area-of-effect attack.

skill.name: Savage Strikes
skill.description: You make a pair of savage attacks, followed by a quick off-hand swipe.

skill.name: Brutal Strikes
skill.description: You make three deadly attacks.

skill.name: Blade-storm
skill.description: You make a full area-of-effect attack.

skill.name: Bracing Attack
skill.description: You make an attack which allows you to brace yourself against counterattack, increasing your Morale by a small amount.

skill.name: Relentless Strike
skill.description: You use all of your Fervour to deal a devastating attack and a quick off-hand swipe. The primary attack can only be evaded, it will never miss against on level targets and cannot be parried or blocked.

skill.name: Herald's Strike
skill.description: This stronger melee attack increases the effects of healing on yourself for a short time and gives Morale to your group.

skill.name: Song of Vigour
skill.description: Tier 1 Ballad: This short song takes time to execute, and instead of dealing damages to your foes, it distributes the buff to your Fellowship.

skill.name: Piercing Cry
skill.description: Your shout does light damage to your enemies. This skill now has a higher critical chance and can stun an opponent.

skill.name: Song of Balance
skill.description: Tier 2 Ballad: This short song takes time to execute, and instead of dealing damages to your foes, it distributes the buff to your Fellowship. Requires a recent Tier 1 ballad.

skill.name: Benediction of the Raven
skill.description: This skill makes the target more vulnerable to fire.

skill.name: Distraction
skill.description: This channeled skill debuffs archers' damage.

skill.name: Evasion
skill.description: This self buff protects the raven from shadow and melee attacks.

skill.name: Improved Friend of Bears
skill.description: Your understanding of the speech of bears allows you to call one to assist in your adventures.

skill.name: Roaring Challenge
skill.description: This skill forces the target to attack the bear.

skill.name: Shatter Arms
skill.description: This skill applies an armour debuff.

skill.name: Bear Hug
skill.description: This skill stuns the opposition.

skill.name: Brutal Slash
skill.description: This skill is a brutal attack.

skill.name: Sign of Power: Improved Righteousness
skill.description: This sign will cure silence, knockdown, and knock-out effects, and then will provide temporary immunity to knockdown and knock-out effects. Used preventively, it will make you immune to these effects for a period of time.

skill.name: Sign of Power: Improved Vigilance
skill.description: This sign provides you with a heightened vigilance against those who would hide from your gaze.

skill.name: Tangle-foot
skill.description: You can knock an enemy down, opening up an opportunity to use Fellowship skills if you are in a Fellowship. Only useable while in Stealth, but it does not break your Stealth.

skill.name: Surprise Strike
skill.description: You are skilled at surprising your enemy in battle, inflicting more damage when attacking from behind or while in Stealth. Critical hits with Surprise Strike are more damaging than most skills.

skill.name: Cunning Attack
skill.description: Your formidable cunning allows a darting attack which continues to deal damage after you strike, dealing even more damage if the attack is made while in Stealth.

skill.name: Provoke
skill.description: You can cause your enemy to focus his aggression on his current opponent, whether that is yourself or an ally.

skill.name: Reveal Weakness
skill.description: While you maintain this ability, you are able to point out weaknesses in your enemy's defences, increasing the damage taken from attacks. Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: Quick Shot: Flaming Arrow
skill.description: You can nock and loose an arrow quickly. You set your oil-soaked arrows alight, inflicting fire damage.

skill.name: Quick Shot: Elvish Arrow
skill.description: You can nock and loose an arrow quickly. Your knowledge of Elvish or dwarf-virtues allows your arrows to inflict light damage.

skill.name: Burning Arrow
skill.description: Your oil-soaked arrow sets your enemy aflame and causes it to burn and slightly slows movement speed.

skill.name: Eldarin Arrow
skill.description: Through your knowledge of Elvish or dwarf-virtues, your arrow causes light damage over time and slightly slows movement speed.

skill.name: Swift Bow: Ablaze
skill.description: You are able to loose two missiles in rapid succession. You set your oil-soaked arrows alight, inflicting fire damage.

skill.name: Swift Bow: Star-light
skill.description: You are able to loose two missiles in rapid succession. Your knowledge of Elvish or dwarf-virtues allows your arrows to inflict light damage.

skill.name: Penetrating Shot: Burn Through
skill.description: An extremely damaging shot that pierces the armour of your enemy, ignoring 10% mitigation. You set your oil-soaked arrows alight, inflicting fire damage.

skill.name: Penetrating Shot: Pierce the Darkness
skill.description: An extremely damaging shot that pierces the armour of your enemy, ignoring 10% mitigation. Your knowledge of Elvish or dwarf-virtues allows your arrows to inflict light damage.

skill.name: Rain of Arrows: Fire-storm
skill.description: You rain arrows down upon your enemies, allowing you to hit multiple targets. You set your oil-soaked arrows alight, inflicting fire damage.

skill.name: Rain of Arrows: Light From The Sky
skill.description: You rain arrows down upon your enemies, allowing you to hit multiple targets. Your knowledge of Elvish or dwarf-virtues allows your arrows to inflict light damage.

skill.name: Swift Stroke
skill.description: A fast, damaging melee attack.

skill.name: Low Cut
skill.description: You can make a low cut in front of you which can temporarily slow the movement speed of up to 3 of your enemies.

skill.name: Scourging Blow
skill.description: This attack wounds your foe, dealing additional damage if the enemy is suffering from your Barbed Arrow. However, using this skill will stop the bleeding.

skill.name: Agile Rejoinder
skill.description: When you parry an enemy's attack, you can respond with a highly damaging melee attack.

skill.name: Stance: Endurance
skill.description: You take a stance which decreases the Power cost and reduces the chance that your enemy's attention will turn to you. While in Endurance Stance, your Quick Shot does not draw as much attention as it normally does.

skill.name: Throw Stone
skill.description: This grants you a short ranged attack.

skill.name: Return to the Shire
skill.description: Your skill as a hobbit allows you to find a path back to The Shire. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Hobbit-resilience
skill.description: You can raise your Fellowship's Hope value through good old-fashioned hobbit-cheer. This does not stack with other Hope buffs.

skill.name: Hobbit-stealth
skill.description: Although untrained, you have the natural ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you, especially when moving in front of them.

skill.name: Hobbit-silence
skill.description: You can lie prone in complete silence, causing enemies to ignore you.

skill.name: Upper-cut
skill.description: You make a stiff punch at your enemy.

skill.name: Return to Bree
skill.description: This enables you to quickly return to Bree. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Duty-bound
skill.description: You provide a bonus to your Fellowship's Morale.

skill.name: Strength of Morale
skill.description: In combat, the Race of Man is known for its unquenchable spirit. This skill restores lost morale.

skill.name: Sylvan Shadows
skill.description: Although untrained, you have the natural ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you, especially when moving in front of them.

skill.name: Return to Rivendell
skill.description: This enables you to quickly return to Rivendell. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Eldar's Grace
skill.description: With the speed and grace of the Eldar, you can put up a strong parry defence.

skill.name: Power of the Eldar
skill.description: You provide a bonus to your Fellowship's Power.

skill.name: Head-butt
skill.description: Allows you to smash an enemy with your head for damage.

skill.name: Return to Thorin's Gate
skill.description: This enables you to quickly return to Thorin's Gate. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Endurance of Stone
skill.description: For a short amount of time, you can withstand blows that would batter a weaker race's Morale into dust.

skill.name: Dwarf-endurance
skill.description: You provide a bonus to your Fellowship's Vitality.

skill.name: Sudden Strikes
skill.description: Two fast attacks on your target.

skill.name: Jagged Cut
skill.description: A sweeping cut that can damage multiple targets in front of you.

skill.name: Sundering Blow
skill.description: A destructive attack, weakening the target's armour.

skill.name: Devastating Strike
skill.description: When your target has less than half of their morale, you can make an extremely damaging attack with an increased chance to critical. This skill will consume all your remaining power.

skill.name: Blinding Dust
skill.description: You throw dust into the air around, blinding nearby foes.

skill.name: Glory in Victory
skill.description: The sight of your opponents falling before you catapults you into an empowering rage, giving you burst of healing and increasing damage dealt and taken.

skill.name: Dual-wield Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when dual-wielding one-handed weapons.

skill.name: Strong Pull
skill.description: You pull on your bow and loose an arrow.

skill.name: Screaming Shafts
skill.description: You loose several arrows, carved and crafted to howl as they fly through the air, dealing shadow damage.

skill.name: Punctured Target
skill.description: A sharpened arrow that can pierce armour.

skill.name: Hindering Shot
skill.description: A shaft aimed to slow the movement of your quarry.

skill.name: Cut
skill.description: A sweeping cut that can damage multiple targets in front of you.

skill.name: Moving Target
skill.description: You can better evade the attacks of your foes for a short period of time.

skill.name: 1H Weapon Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when wielding only a single one-handed weapon.

skill.name: Initimdating Shout
skill.description: A ferocious and terrifying battle roar to weaken the certainty and morale of your foe.

skill.name: Cleave
skill.description: You swing your weapon at your foe.

skill.name: Crack The Whip
skill.description: Your blistering derision shames your target to higher health.

skill.name: On Your Feet!
skill.description: You bellow a harsh command, enabling up to 5 nearby and defeated allies to rise, albeit at very low health.

skill.name: Field Promotion
skill.description: You single out an ally to support and protect them in the midst of battle.

skill.name: Aura of Command
skill.description: When the fight has begun, your commanding aura allows your allies to fight more viciously.

skill.name: 1H Weapon/Shield Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when wielding a one-handed weapon with a shield.

skill.name: Piercing Attack
skill.description: An attack with your sharp talons deals damage and causes the target to bleed.

skill.name: Tainted Kiss
skill.description: A ranged attack which flings a painful contact poison at the target causing damage over time.

skill.name: Latent Poison
skill.description: A bite injecting a poison which weakens the target and can stun them if not cured.

skill.name: Snaring Web
skill.description: A ranged attack that targets the victim's legs with sticky webs, rooting them in place.

skill.name: Entangling Web
skill.description: You can cover your target's arms with sticky webbing, slowing their attacks.

skill.name: Poison Spray
skill.description: You can spit a crippling poison in a spray, hitting enemies in front of you up to a short distance away. This skill is only effective against players.

skill.name: Trapdoor Sanctuary
skill.description: You can burrow into the ground becoming invulnerable and hidden for a limited time.

skill.name: Claws
skill.description: You attack with your sharp and piercing claws.

skill.name: Pounce
skill.description: You leap at your target to distract them, interrupting actions they were performing. If the target was suffering from your crippling bite he is knocked down.

skill.name: Savage Fangs
skill.description: You rip at your target's flesh, tearing muscle and slowing his attacks. If the target was suffering from your crippling bite he begins taking damage over time.

skill.name: Crippling Bite
skill.description: A sharp snap of your jaws and your target's movement is slowed.

skill.name: Throat Rip
skill.description: You sink your teeth and rip, your target is silenced.

skill.name: Sprint
skill.description: A sudden burst of speed for catching prey, or to avoid becoming it.

skill.name: Bestial Claws
skill.description: With the element of surprise, your clawing attack is even more damaging.

skill.name: Sudden Pounce
skill.description: Unseen till the last moment, you leap at your target and knock them down to the ground.

skill.name: Swing Away
skill.description: Send your friends away!

skill.name: Fellowship's Heart
skill.description: A short song of courage removes fear effects and grants fear immunity to your entire Fellowship, as well as acting as a powerful heal over time.

skill.name: Banner of Hope
skill.description: Your banner rallies the morale of your nearby companions.

skill.name: Banner of Victory
skill.description: Your banner increases the power regeneration your nearby companions.

skill.name: Banner of War
skill.description: Your banner inspires your nearby companions to greater feats of skill and strength.

skill.name: Bow Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when wielding a bow.

skill.name: Fire (Rank 4)
skill.description: A basic ranged weapon attack.

skill.name: Cleave (Rank 4)
skill.description: An attack that makes up for a lack of elegance with brutal effectiveness.

skill.name: Slice (Rank 3)
skill.description: A sweeping cut that can damage multiple targets in front of the attacker.

skill.name: Rend (Rank 1)
skill.description: Two quick attacks on your target.

skill.name: Slash (Rank 2)
skill.description: A basic, but effective cutting attack.

skill.name: Heroics
skill.description: Your heroic actions inspire your fellows restoring their power, while sapping yours. This skill can only be played after defeating an enemy.

skill.name: Blocking Blades
skill.description: Increases your parry rate. This skill can only be played after defeating an enemy.

skill.name: Glory
skill.description: Your threat generation and Power regeneration are increased at the expense of damage output.

skill.name: Red Haze
skill.description: Adds a fervour pip when cast, and an additional fervour pip every 15 seconds. This skill can only be played after defeating an enemy.

skill.name: Chicken Hit
skill.description: Send the chicken flying.

skill.name: Poison Spit
skill.description: Ranged auto-attack for Spider Weaver.

skill.name: 1H Unarmed Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when attacking with single unarmed attacks.

skill.name: Dual Unarmed Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when dual-unarmed attacking.

skill.name: Ebbing Ire
skill.description: This skill takes threat away from the Champion and gives it to a fellowship member.

skill.name: Rising Ire
skill.description: This skill takes threat away from a fellowship member and gives it to the Champion.

skill.name: Inspire
skill.description: This melee attack raises the Morale of your Shield-brother.

skill.name: Shield-brother
skill.description: This toggle marks one of your fellows as your Shield-brother, making them the target of some of your abilities.

skill.name: 1H Weapon Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when wielding only a single one-handed weapon.

skill.name: Bow Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when wielding a bow.

skill.name: Stealth
skill.description: A scattered people, the Rangers of the North are skilled at becoming unseen when they wish it.

skill.name: Misdirection
skill.description: Although not capable of being invisible in the spirit world, Rangers are still known for disappearing from sight. For a short while your stealth is extremely effective.

skill.name: Dúnadan’s Strike
skill.description: A ranger is both master of blade and bow. This attack will knock down the opponent.

skill.name: Blood of the Dúnedain
skill.description: Strength of morale can be called from the line of Elros even still in this dark time. This will restore morale to the Ranger.

skill.name: Dúnedain Mark
skill.description: When marked as a prey of one of the Dúnedain, their wrath is terrible. This skill is the prerequisite of Fly True.

skill.name: Fly True
skill.description: This shot can only be used against those that bear the Dunedain Mark, but once marked, the enemy takes devastating damage. This skill can only be used from stealth. It will never miss against on-level creatures. On a critical the target will take power damage as well.

skill.name: Return to Camp
skill.description: You can bind yourself to one of many camp sites scattered across the world. Then you can use your knowledge of the land to travel with your fellowship back to your current camp site. Requires rations which may be acquired from Provisioners.

skill.name: Guide to Ost Guruth
skill.description: Your skill as a tracker allows you to find a path for you and your Fellowship to Ost Guruth in the Lonelands. This skill is easily interrupted. Requires rations which may be acquired from Provisioners.

skill.name: Guide to Michel Delving
skill.description: Your skill as a tracker allows you to find a path for you and your Fellowship to Michel Delving in the Shire. This skill is easily interrupted. Requires rations which may be acquired from Provisioners.

skill.name: Guide to Evendim
skill.description: Your skill as a tracker allows you to find a path for you and your Fellowship to Evendim. This skill is easily interrupted. Requires rations which may be acquired from Provisioners.

skill.name: Guide to West Angmar
skill.description: Your skill as a tracker allows you to find a path for you and your Fellowship to West Angmar. This skill is easily interrupted. Requires rations which may be acquired from Provisioners.

skill.name: Guide to East Angmar
skill.description: Your skill as a tracker allows you to find a path for you and your Fellowship to East Angmar. This skill is easily interrupted. Requires rations which may be acquired from Provisioners.

skill.name: Dagger Throw
skill.description: This well thrown knife will root an in-bound target.

skill.name: Righteousness Arrow
skill.description: These arrows will make the servant of the Eye burn.

skill.name: Heart Seeker
skill.description: Taking great care and practiced aim, you prepare a shot to strike at your target's most vital weak spot. This shot will not miss, nor can your target parry, block, or evade it.

skill.name: Strength of the Earth
skill.description: You find strength in the land; devoting all your attention you can recover power swiftly in the midst of conflict. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Crush
skill.description: Crush little annoying things. Sometimes, stun them. Sometimes, make them hurt long time.

skill.name: Swat
skill.description: Swat the whiny little things so they fly away. Sometimes, they run slow after.

skill.name: Rock
skill.description: Throw rock at far away things. Hurt things near far thing. Sometimes, make things bleed after.

skill.name: 1H Weapon Attack
skill.description: Quick 1h club auto-attack

skill.name: Throw Rock
skill.description: Quick-ish stone from the ground attack

skill.name: Smash
skill.description: Hit small things twice. Sometimes, make things hit back slow.

skill.name: Stomp
skill.description: Bring foot up, put foot down, puny things fall over. Sometimes, things get hurt easier after.

skill.name: Thud
skill.description: Pick up rock. Drop rock. Sometimes, hurt little things extra lots.

skill.name: Rampage
skill.description: Get angry. Hit harder. Hit faster. Not move so fast.

skill.name: Roar
skill.description: Roar of rage. When is sometimes? Sometimes is next.

skill.name: Draw Attention
skill.description: This skill draws the attention of nearby monsters to the Hunter's Lure trap.

skill.name: Set Snare
skill.description: Your wilderness knowledge allows you to prepare a snare for enemies which will slow them and cause them damage over time. The trap remains for 60 seconds after being placed. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: To Arms
skill.description: You temporarily increase the offensive strength of your Shield-brother.

skill.name: Kick
skill.description: You make a melee attack that interrupts any time-delayed actions your opponent is attempting.

skill.name: Grave Wound
skill.description: You inflict a blow that calls attention to yourself in battle. When dealt to a foe bleeding from your Cutting Attack, your perceived threat is also raised.

skill.name: Withdraw
skill.description: A well ordered withdrawal can aid the Captain in living through a harsh battle. This skill lowers your threat to your opponents around you.

skill.name: Time of Need
skill.description: You sacrifice some of your morale to gain the same effect as defeating an enemy and to put yourself in a Battle-readied State.

skill.name: Blade of Elendil
skill.description: This powerful melee attack has an increased chance to critical and inspires your fellows to invoke the Light of Elendil. This skill can only be executed when you are in a Battle-hardened State.

skill.name: Escape from Darkness
skill.description: You are able to revive and protect a fallen companion with three quarters of their Morale and half of their Power.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Improved Herald of Victory
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of Victory into battle. This banner increases the maximum Power and in-combat Power regeneration of those around it.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Improved Herald of War
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of War into battle. This banner increases the Might and Agility of those around it.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Improved Herald of Hope
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of Hope into battle. This banner increases the maximum Morale and in-combat Morale regeneration of those around it.

skill.name: Track Artifacts
skill.description: When active, nearby artifacts are displayed on the radar.

skill.name: 1H Unarmed Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when attacking with single unarmed attacks.

skill.name: Bob and Weave
skill.description: Sometimes survival comes down to not being hit. Actually, most times.

skill.name: Seek The Worm
skill.description: Nothing can escape your searching gaze. So long as it is a worm.

skill.name: Fowl Fleetness
skill.description: A burst of speed can make the difference between freedom and flattened.

skill.name: Strength of Will
skill.description: Your reassuring presence increases the amount of Morale your Shield-brother recovers.

skill.name: Possum Impersonation
skill.description: Middle-Earth is a dangerous place. Sometimes it is good to be dead.

skill.name: Troll's Brutality (Melee)
skill.description: This warband skill does direct melee damage to your target and can contribute to warband manoeuvres.

skill.name: Paranoia
skill.description: You're not sure what, but something isn't right.

skill.name: Bane Flare
skill.description: The Lore-master heaves a glowing orb into the sky that detonates into an explosion of fireworks. Up to three of the dead will then be stunned for 5 seconds and then mezzed for 10 seconds.

skill.name: Warding Knowledge: Creatures of Nature
skill.description: Your knowledge of warding lore, enables you to create an area that is the bane of the chosen creature, creating a sanctified area where they will take more damage from tactical skills and have an increased miss chance. This lasts for one minute.

skill.name: Warding Knowledge: Drakes
skill.description: Your knowledge of warding lore, enables you to create an area that is the bane of the chosen creature, creating a sanctified area where they will take more damage from tactical skills and have an increased miss chance. This lasts for one minute.

skill.name: Warding Knowledge: Dead
skill.description: Your knowledge of warding lore, enables you to create an area that is the bane of the chosen creature, creating a sanctified area where they will take more damage from tactical skills and have an increased miss chance. This lasts for one minute.

skill.name: Ancient Craft
skill.description: This allows the Lore-master to prepare a concoction of magnetized metal fillings and other obscure materials. This makes wearing armor more difficult and heavily armored creatures irritated thereby rendering their armor ineffective.

skill.name: Sticky Tar
skill.description: The Lore-master smashes a vial of foul smelling sticky tar onto the ground causing an area that is 50% harder to move through, as well as making enemy creatures 10% more vulnerable to fire. This area lasts for one minute.

skill.name: Storm-lore
skill.description: The Lore-master can smash his staff upon the ground, causing a thunderclap stunning creatures around him for 3 seconds and causing weak damage.

skill.name: Tale of Warding
skill.description: This aura increases the Hope and Armour of your Fellowship.

skill.name: Tale of Battle
skill.description: This aura increases the Vitality and Wound Resistance of your Fellowship.

skill.name: Chant of the Oathbreaker
skill.description: This chant summons an Oathbreaker Blade to harry your foe. When in War-speech, this chant is upgraded to Chorus of the Oathbreakers.

skill.name: Chorus of the Oathbreakers
skill.description: This howl summons a pair of Oathbreaker Blades to harry your foe.

skill.name: War-speech
skill.description: Your charismatic speech drives fear into the hearts of your enemies.

skill.name: Call to the Elder King
skill.description: War-speech must be active to use this skill. You invoke the name of the Elder King, chief of the Valar, blasting a group of your foes and reducing their resistance to further attacks.

skill.name: Call of the Second Age
skill.description: War-speech must be active to use this skill. Your rousing tales of the Second Age dishearten nearby foes and lighten the footsteps of your allies.

skill.name: Call to Greatness
skill.description: You call out to a fellow, inspiring him to greatness.

skill.name: Call to the Fellowship
skill.description: You call out to your fellows, encouraging them to greater effectiveness during Fellowship Manoeuvres.

skill.name: Gift of the Hammerhand
skill.description: You have mastered Lay of the Hammerhand well enough to bestow a lesser benefit upon an ally.

skill.name: Lightning Storm
skill.description: The Lore-master summons a storm which attracts electrical energy to targets that have already been coated with the mixture of materials from Ancient Craft. This bond of nature is difficult for the mortal races and is very demanding on the Lore-master's morale.

skill.name: Fell Spirit's Terror (Ranged)
skill.description: This warband skill does direct ranged damage to your target, then transfers morale to you from your target and can contribute to warband manoeuvres.

skill.name: Conviction Pair
skill.description: Conviction Pair

skill.name: Conviction Sextuplet
skill.description: Conviction Sextuplet

skill.description: Guile Contribution

skill.description: This warband skill does direct melee damage to your target, then morale over time and can contribute to warband manoeuvres.

skill.name: Wight's Rot (Melee)
skill.description: This warband skill does direct melee damage to your target, then transfers power to you from your target and can contribute to warband manoeuvres.

skill.name: Strength Quintuplet
skill.description: Strength Quintuplet

skill.name: Wight's Rot (Ranged)
skill.description: This warband skill does direct ranged damage to your target, then transfers power to you from your target and can contribute to warband manoeuvres.

skill.name: Tactics Quad
skill.description: Tactics Quad
