skill.description: Guile Ranged Sextuplet

skill.name: Tactics Sextuplet
skill.description: Tactics Sextuplet

skill.name: Air-lore
skill.description: Empowered air swirls around your target, inflicting damage on any who strike it. This skill cannot be used on yourself.

skill.name: Lynx-speech
skill.description: Your understanding of the speech of lynx allows you to call one to assist in your adventures.

skill.name: Chord of Salvation
skill.description: You strike a quick but potent chord, instantly recovering an ally's Morale.

skill.name: Irresistible Melody
skill.description: You perform a melody so irresistable that all Free Peoples who hear it cannot help but dance.

skill.name: Scribe Manual : Harp
skill.description: This will scribe a manual to teach others to play the harp. Doing so is much more taxing then training in person and requires a Blank Mentor Manual.

skill.name: Scribe Stance
skill.description: When you enter Scribe Stance, you change your Mentor skills into Scribe Manual skills, allowing you to create manuals to teach instruments. Scribing manuals is much more taxing then teaching in person, requires a Blank Mentor Manual, and will apply a 10 day cooldown to all Mentor skills.

skill.name: Scribe Manual : Bagpipes
skill.description: This will scribe a manual to teach others to play the bagpipes. Doing so is much more taxing then training in person and requires a Blank Mentor Manual.

skill.name: Scribe Manual : Clarinet
skill.description: This will scribe a manual to teach others to play the clarinet. Doing so is much more taxing then training in person and requires a Blank Mentor Manual.

skill.name: Scribe Manual : Cowbell
skill.description: This will scribe a manual to teach others to play the cowbell. Doing so is much more taxing then training in person and requires a Blank Mentor Manual.

skill.name: Scribe Manual : Drums
skill.description: This will scribe a manual to teach others to play the drum. Doing so is much more taxing then training in person and requires a Blank Mentor Manual.

skill.name: Scribe Manual : Flute
skill.description: This will scribe a manual to teach others to play the flute. Doing so is much more taxing then training in person and requires a Blank Mentor Manual.

skill.name: Scribe Manual : Horn
skill.description: This will scribe a manual to teach others to play the horn. Doing so is much more taxing then training in person and requires a Blank Mentor Manual.

skill.name: Scribe Manual : Moor Cowbell
skill.description: This will scribe a manual to teach others to play Moor cowbell. Doing so is much more taxing then training in person and requires a Blank Mentor Manual.

skill.name: Scribe Manual : Theorbo
skill.description: This will scribe a manual to teach others to play the theorbo. Doing so is much more taxing then training in person and requires a Blank Mentor Manual.

skill.name: Feral Strike
skill.description: An eye gouge and slash. This skill works in a 60 degree front arc.

skill.name: Slashing Claws
skill.description: The agile lynx darts from enemy to enemy slashing them with its claws in a forward 180 arc.

skill.name: Surprise Attack
skill.description: A massive attack that works only from stealth. This skill has a high chance scoring a critical attack. When attacking from behind this attack delivers more damage.

skill.name: Bird-speech
skill.description: Your understanding of the speech of bird allows you to call one to make the dark times a little brighter.

skill.name: Cat-speech
skill.description: Your understanding of the speech of cat allows you to call one to make the dark times a little brighter.

skill.name: Dog-speech
skill.description: Your understanding of the speech of dog allows you to call one to make the dark times a little brighter.

skill.name: Fox-speech
skill.description: Your understanding of the speech of fox allows you to call one to make the dark times a little brighter.

skill.name: Frog-speech
skill.description: Your understanding of the speech of frog allows you to call one to make the dark times a little brighter.

skill.name: Rabbit-speech
skill.description: Your understanding of the speech of rabbit allows you to call one to make the dark times a little brighter.

skill.name: Snake-speech
skill.description: Your understanding of the speech of snake allows you to call one to make the dark times a little brighter.

skill.name: Squirrel-speech
skill.description: Your understanding of the speech of cat allows you to call one to make the dark times a little brighter.

skill.name: Turtle-speech
skill.description: Your understanding of the speech of turtle allows you to call one to make the dark times a little brighter.

skill.name: Back from the Brink
skill.description: With some careful thought, the Lore-master can restore a fallen comrade to fighting trim, reviving a defeated ally at a small cost of fragrant herbs.

skill.name: Enter Stealthed State
skill.description: This skill is a fast version of stealth.

skill.name: Tendon Shred
skill.description: Your teeth bite deeply of your foe, tearing a tendon and opening a chance for a warband manoeuver.

skill.name: Eye Rake
skill.description: A swift swipe meant for the eyes breaks your opponent's concentration.

skill.name: Charge!
skill.description: When the time comes to enter the fray it falls to the orcs to break battle lines. You gain a short immunity to root, stun and daze effects. Your speed increases for a brief period of time.

skill.name: Gut Punch
skill.description: When your target begins preparing an attack, you give them a swift punch to the gut to interrupt their preparation.

skill.name: Vital Target
skill.description: Your knowledge of the enemy is so great that you can target vital organs with great efficacy.

skill.name: I See You!
skill.description: Your sight is so keen that you can keep a close eye on an enemy and never lose sight of them.

skill.name: No You Don't
skill.description: Seeing a ranged opponent preparing an assault, you take careful aim and disrupt their attempts.

skill.name: Banner of Terror
skill.description: A terrible banner strikes fear into your enemies and weakens their resolve.

skill.name: Black Speech
skill.description: You spew soul words in the forgotten and vile language of Lugbûrz. The conviction and terror inherent in this speech weakens the heart of your enemy.

skill.name: Command Post
skill.description: You place a banner bearing the symbol of the mightiest orc tribe, the Krahjarn. All who stand near the banner draw strength from the symbol.

skill.name: Web the Earth
skill.description: Your webs can be used to create sticky areas on the ground that slow the movement of any enemy who dares cross them.

skill.name: Smothering Web
skill.description: Focusing all your energy on a single target you are able to overwhelm them beneath the weight of your webs opening the possibility of a fellowship manoeuver.

skill.name: Hatchlings
skill.description: A ranged attack delivering a small amount of damage and a host of eggs that could hatch!

skill.name: Knowledge of the Lore-master
skill.description: This skill enables you to examine the weaknesses and strengths of certain creatures.

skill.name: Mentor : Harp
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the harp.

skill.name: Mentor : Bagpipes
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the bagpipes.

skill.name: Mentor : Clarinet
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the clarinet.

skill.name: Mentor : Cowbell
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the cowbell.

skill.name: Mentor : Drums
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the drum.

skill.name: Mentor : Flute
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the flute.

skill.name: Mentor : Horn
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the horn.

skill.name: Mentor : Moor Cowbell
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play Moor cowbell.

skill.name: Mentor : Theorbo
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the theorbo.

skill.name: Travel to Personal House
skill.description: Return quickly to your personal home. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Travel to Kinship House
skill.description: Return quickly to your kinship's house. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Eyepeck
skill.description: This skill will cause the Eagle to break the induction of a target, they are fighting.
